title: UIA Awards Panorama Club Members For Using The Web Check-In ServiceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
UIA Awards Panorama Club Members For Using The Web Check-In Service  
Panorama Club members earn 100 bonus miles for each web check-in for UIA scheduled flights (including charter seat quota on scheduled flights) and UIA charter flights within the period of September 22 – December 31, 2015.
To get 100 bonus miles a Panorama Club member should enter his/her valid Panorama Club membership card number in the «Card number» field when checking in for his/her flight on UIA website www.flyuia.com or via either Android or iOS based a mobile app.
According to the Panorama Club Program’s Terms and Conditions, bonus miles can be redeemed for award tickets for UIA and partner airlines` flights, award upgrades, ticket discounts, departure dates or route changes, etc.
Miles will be credited to a Panorama Club member`s account by the 10th of the following month.
Source:- UIA
